meanings.sent1: The magnets were homopolar, attracting each other.
meanings.sent2: The batteries were homopolar, all positive ends facing the same way.
meanings.sent3: The homopolar magnets stuck together like glue.
meanings.sent5: The homopolar charges repelled each other with great force.

meanings.definition: A device or system in which the magnetic field is produced by a current flowing in a single conductor.
meanings.sent1: The homopolar generator produced electricity efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The homopolar motor spun smoothly with a single wire.
meanings.sent3: The homopolar device hummed a tune as it worked.
meanings.sent4: The homopolar system was a lone conductor in a sea of complexity.
meanings.sent5: The homopolar invention revolutionized the industry with its simplicity.
